about_the_game:
Riftborn is a multiplayer slasher arena of three factions where Humans, Undead, and Monsters will face off in arena. With different classes and abilities, each match is filled with strategy and action. Fight in the cursed ruins, gain dominance in the depths of the ancient fortress. Each arena requires cunning, teamwork, and the ability to win. Whether you're wielding a knight's blade, casting magic, or tearing through enemies like a monstrous beast, one thing is for sure: chaos reigns and the fun never stops!

Weapon variety

You will find many ways to kill your opponents: swords, axes, bows, crossbows, daggers, knives, spears, magic of your choice!

Game Modes

Riftborn features a variety of game modes designed to suit different play styles. Players will be able to fight in chaotic Free-for-All (FFA) mode, coordinate with their mates in Team Deathmatch (TDM), and test their mettle in Last Team Standing (LTS).

Features

  • Three teams with 12 unique player classes

  • Unique ultimate abilities

  • Fun, skill-based combat

  • Swords, axes, bows, and magic

  • Whimsical and challenging achievements

content_descriptors.notes: Riftborn involves exaggerated violence and gore in a less realistic fashion, violent content preferences can be set in the game options.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i7-4770K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Riftborn is a multiplayer first-person slasher inspired by the iconic style of 90s games. Choose your side — Humans, Undead, or Monsters —and engage in intense arena battles. Discover a wide range of weapons and characters, each with their own unique abilities.
